General.Name: Asia Tech Image
General.Description: Asia Tech Image Inc. manufactures and sells contact image sensor modules in Taiwan and China. The company's products are used in the inkjet multi-functional printers (MFPs), laser MFPs, scanners, plain paper copiers, digital photo frames, etc. Asia Tech Image Inc. was incorporated in 2004 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 880, Zhongzheng Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan
